name: Draw Pass (Duel Links Skill)
text:
Generic / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
During your Draw Phase, instead of drawing: Gain 300 LP.
This Skill can only be used three times per Duel.

(This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
